m_szDocTitle: China Most Likely Country to Fund Renewables - CleanTechies
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- CLEANTECHIES 1 Comment A recent Bloomberg survey of key energy decision-makers concluded that China shows more government support than any other country for funding renewable energy . It also shows equally high support for transformational clean technologies, like smart grids and electric cars.  With the right government backing, China could address its own energy security issues with technology to spare for export.
